TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMetadataExchange

summary.span: 公开用于返回有关服务的元数据的方法。

span.span: Exposes methods used to return metadata about a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编程 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务时，发布有关该服务的元数据非常有用。When programming [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services, it is useful to publish metadata about the service. 例如，元数据可以是描述某服务使用的所有方法和数据类型的 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 文档。For example, metadata can be a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that describes all of the methods and data types employed by a service. 返回有关 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务的元数据允许服务的使用程序轻松为该服务创建客户端。Returning metadata about an [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service allows consumers of a service to easily create clients for the service. 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]元数据终结点，请参阅[元数据](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/metadata.md)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] metadata endpoints, see [Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/metadata.md). 使用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 发布元数据通过公开一个或多个元数据终结点实现的服务。Services implemented using [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] publish metadata by exposing one or more metadata endpoints. 与其他任何终结点一样，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中的元数据终结点具有一个地址，一个绑定和一个协定。Metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] have an address, a binding and a contract like any other endpoint. 接口指定由 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中的所有元数据终结点实现的服务协定。The interface specifies the service contract implemented by all metadata endpoints in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. 不需要在您的服务实现中实现 。There is no need to implement the contract in your service implementation. 相反，请将 添加到服务说明。Instead, add the to the service description. 或者，在使用配置时，将终结点元素的 `contract` 属性设置为 `IMetadataExchange`。Or, when using configuration, set the `contract` attribute of the endpoint element to `IMetadataExchange`. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 使用配置文件服务的发布元数据](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md). 有关详细信息中发布元数据[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]请参阅[发布元数据](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md)。For details on publishing metadata in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] see [Publishing Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGet (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGet(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGet (request As Message, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGet(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Message ^ request, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: request
param.span: 应处理以确定要返回的元数据的 。

span.span: A that should be processed to determine the metadata to return.

param.name: callback
param.span: 指向将处理元数据的方法的 。

span.span: An that points to the method that will process the metadata.

param.name: state
param.span: 允许调用方确定要返回的异步调用的任意数据。

span.span: Any data which allows the caller to determine which asynchronous call is being returned.

summary.span: 开始元数据的异步检索。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous retrieval of metadata.

returns.span: 一个 ，可传递给 方法。

span.span: An that can be passed to the method.

Public Function EndGet (result As IAsyncResult) As Message

param.name: result
param.span: 一个 ，包含用于进一步处理元数据的数据。

span.span: An that contains data used to further process the metadata.
